document: ENVIRONMENTAL INFLUENCE ON POSTEMERGENCE CHEMICAL CONTROL OF CRABGRASS (Digitaria spp.) IN TURF by William John Chism Dissertation submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy in Weed Science APPROVED: S. Wayne Bingham, Chairman E. Scott Hagood Kriton K. Hatzios Dale D. Wolf May, 1990 Blacksburg, Virginia
